Ulauncher

Application launcher for Linux

Fuzzy search

‚Äã Type in an application name without worrying about spelling. Ulauncher will figure out what you meant. It also remembers your previous choices and automatically selects the best option for you

Custom color themes

Ulauncher provides 4 themes built in. But if you need something different you can always create a custom color theme. Docs are here

Shortcuts & extensions

Improve your workflow with customizable shortcuts and extensions. Create a shortcut for web search or your scripts or install a 3rd party extension

Fast directory browser

‚Äã Browse files and directories with ease.
Type ~ or / to start. Press Alt+Enter to access an alt menu

Subscribe to Announcements and New Releases

Download

  • Stable release: loading...
  • Dev release: loading...

  • Ubuntu (Debian) loading link...

    Install via PPA (Ubuntu):

    Note that the above instructions are specifically for Ubuntu. For Debian instructions, click here to expand.
    Alternatively, you can download the .deb file and run:
    sudo apt install ./ulauncher_x.y.z_all.deb or right click and choose to open in your graphical installer (normally named "Software").

  • Arch Linux Available in AUR: https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/ulauncher/

  • Fedora Available for all current Fedora Linux Releases:
    #

    sudo dnf copr enable troycurtisjr/ulauncher
    sudo dnf install ulauncher

  • OpenSUSE loading link...

    sudo zypper in packagename.rpm or double click

  • CentOS 7 loading link...

    sudo yum install epel-release && sudo yum install packagename.rpm
